testcase.name: TC01_selecting birth year
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to "https://testcenter.techproeducation.com/index.php?page=dropdown".passed And I select the year as 2009...............................................passed And I select the months as "January"........................................passed And I select the day as 17..................................................passed And I get the list of US states and click on "California"...................passed And I hold the browser open.................................................passed
